about_the_game: From pallet to a powerhouse—how big can you grow? In Fulfillment Center Simulator, you inherit a small storage container with nothing but a pallet of salt and a big dream. Manage orders, optimize layouts, and expand your empire to become the ultimate logistics tycoon. Experience the thrill of growing your business while navigating the challenges of supply chain management, customer demands, and employee satisfaction. With advanced physics, customizable warehouses, and a dynamic market, every decision counts.
detailed_description: From pallet to a powerhouse—how big can you grow? In Fulfillment Center Simulator, you inherit a small storage container with nothing but a pallet of salt and a big dream. Manage orders, optimize layouts, and expand your empire to become the ultimate logistics tycoon. Experience the thrill of growing your business while navigating the challenges of supply chain management, customer demands, and employee satisfaction. With advanced physics, customizable warehouses, and a dynamic market, every decision counts.
name: Fulfillment Center Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatable

short_description: Start with a pallet of salt. End with a logistics empire. Manage orders, expand warehouses, and grow big in Fulfillment Center Simulator!
